name: Fetch (School Assignment)
description:
This school assignment involved "fixing" the code in a game to make it run. Assets are very much not mine.

Challenge from: https://learn.unity.com/tutorial/challenge-2-play-fetch-with-random-values-and-a...

Goal:

Send your dogs forward to catch the balls.

Controls:

Space - Send forward a dog.

NOTE: there is no scoring or penalty for missing a ball, as per assignment instructions. In Unity, a Debug message would inform you when a ball is dropped, but it was not necessary for this web game.
